patthana15.36:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.36:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.36:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.36:4.1_0: Defiled by defilements, defiled influence, and undefiled freedom from defilements.
patthana15.36:4.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.36:5.1_0: The group of six on wishing is finished.
